subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: There are more than 3,100 Italians entered in the New York City Marathon. But as a member of the elite men’s field with a chance of winning the race, Stefano Baldini is alone.
snippet: There are more than 3,100 Italians entered in the New York City Marathon. But as a member of the elite men’s field with a chance of winning the race, Stefano Baldini is alone.
